body.name: OGX Renewing + Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo & Conditioner Set, 13 Fl Oz (Pack of 2) (packaging may vary), Blue

Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 6 mins
features: MOROCCAN HAIR SECRET: Repair dry, damaged, brittle tresses with this powerful blend infused with argan oil of Morocco. Hydrate while locking in moisture to give hair the look and feel of silky perfection

SOFT, SEDUCTIVE, SILKY: Infused with argan oil of Morocco and silk proteins, this blend helps repair even the most dry, damaged strands, drenching them with hydration and helping to strengthen strands
BEAUTY PURE AND SIMPLE: OGX products are inspired by nature. We don’t try to make hair look “perfect” because we’d rather make hair look fuller, smoother, curlier, or bouncier and smell irresistible.
ROCK WHAT YOU'VE GOT: Whether you need quenching moisture for curly hair, protection for color treated hair, blowout cream or matte pomade, OGX hair care products are designed to bring out your best

TRY OUR QUALITY: Try our shampoo and conditioner if you've used products by Head and Shoulders, Kerastase, Paul Mitchell, Batiste, Biolage, Pantene, Redken, Loreal, Matrix, Bumble and Bumble or Bed Head.
body.description: This exotic precious blend of Moroccan argan oil penetrates, moisturizes, renews and creates softness and strength while protecting your hair from harmful styling heat and UV damage. Unique blend of sulphate free product surfactants.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #3,498 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #47 in Shampoo & Conditioner Sets

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We approach beauty in our own way, pure and simple. Originality inspires us, that’s why we love being different; from our exotic ingredients, to the shape of our bottles, to our quest for sustainability — we approach beauty in our own way. OGX Renewing Plus Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo & Conditioner Salon 13oz Set Lather up with this precious OGX blend containing argan oil of Morocco, to help restore and strengthen your locks to silky perfection. It will help protect your hair from styling, without any sulfates or parabens. Supports shine and softness while strengthening Helps repair damaged strands Helps to hydrate and moisturize

Benefits Our OGX signature line is infused with the Argan Oil from the depths of the Argan tree from Morocco. Rich in natural vitamin E and super-charged antioxidants, this special ingredient has been making hair gorgeous for centuries. Ingredients A unique, precious blend with Argan Oil of Morocco helps to penetrate the hair shaft. Discover newly restored strength, shine, softness and seductive silky perfection. Hair Types This product is good for everyday use. Works well with all hair types: - Dry/Damaged. - Curly. - Thick. - Straight. Regimen For best results, use our entire Argan Oil of Morocco collection to help with every day moisture. After shampooing, we recommend our conditioner followed up with one of the treatments to help moisturize and restore shine to all hair types.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars my hair has never looked so good.
reviews.reviewText: I have thin fine hair and have had problems over the years trying to help it look better. This product has really helped me. My hair is looking better than it ever has.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have dry dull hair
reviews.reviewText: I bought regular argon oil for my dry skin and was amazed at the results so when I saw this I thought if it worked half as good as the oil it was worth a try. If you have dry dull hair please try this. I love it after just one use I could see the difference. It looks shiny and soft. I love both the shampoo and conditioner. I know you will too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shampoo and conditioner
reviews.reviewText: I do like the product. It smells great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice product but awful bottles
reviews.reviewText: This is very nice shampoo and conditioner but the bottles leave a lot to be desired. Too difficult to apply in the shower due to shape, size and slickness of the bottles. Conditioner is difficult to get out of the bottle as it is thick and the bottle doesn’t squeeze well. Please redesign the bottles, a pump bottle would be much better. I would not buy again if in the same containers. I had to pour out the product into different bottles to be able to use. Bottles are the wrong shape for smaller hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes my hair shiny and soft!
reviews.reviewText: The OGX Renewing + Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo & Conditioner Set is a hair care gem. After using this dynamic duo, my hair feels remarkably shiny, smooth, and irresistibly soft. The infusion of argan oil works wonders, imparting a healthy luster to my locks. The pleasant aroma is an added bonus, leaving a lingering, delightful scent that lasts throughout the day. This set is undoubtedly a must-try for those seeking luxurious, nourished hair. Highly recommended for its impressive results and delightful fragrance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm so grateful to have some hair products that contain no alcohol. Been struggling to find something acceptable to bring to impatient where there can't be any alcohol listed in the first five ingredients there's quite literally not enough to choose from and are very hard to find Thank you for making awesome product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not good for fine hsir
reviews.reviewText: Although it has a pleasant smell, my hair is still tangled after use of shampoo AND conditioner. I do not recommend these products for fine or thin hair.
